title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.36 - Stop intersections
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.36 - Stop intersections

State Regulations
(a) Parkway
toll stations. All vehicles approaching a parkway toll station within the
parkway system shall come to a full stop before paying the required toll
charge. (b) Cross County Parkway. (1)

All vehicles approaching the Cross County

Parkway from the following shall, before entering the parkway, come to a full
stop: Tibbits Brook Park

Yonkers Avenue

Valentine Street

Mile Square Road--Seminary Avenue

Midland Avenue--Kimball Avenue

Bronx River Road

Bronx River Parkway
(2)

All vehicles approaching the following
from the Cross County Parkway shall, before entering the same, come to a full
stop: Rumsey Road

Midland Avenue near Yonkers Avenue

Midland Avenue near Kimball Avenue

Midland Avenue near Bronx River Road

Broad Street
(c) [Reserved]
(d) Saw Mill River Parkway. (1)

All vehicles approaching the Saw Mill

River Parkway from the following shall, before entering the parkway, come to a
full stop: McLean Avenue service station

McLean Avenue

Saw Mill River Parkway toll station

Yonkers Avenue--eastbound

Stratton Street from Palmer Avenue

Farragut Avenue

Cliff Street

Clarence Avenue

Ogden Avenue

Cyrus Field Road

Manning Avenue

Woodlands Lake Restaurant

Peter Bont Road (Mountain Road)

New York State Thruway--southbound

Valley Avenue

Van Wert Avenue

Route 119 (White Plains--Tarrytown Road) --northwest
quadrant only

Westchester County parkway police headquarters

Route 9A (Saw Mill River Road) at Hawthorne

Interchange

Marble Avenue--northbound only

Manville Road

Route 120 (King Street--Quaker Street)

Route 133 (West Main Street--northwest quadrant
only)

Green Lane

School Street

Bedford Road--Harris Road--northeast quadrant only
(2)

All vehicles approaching the
following from the Saw Mill River Parkway shall, before entering the same, come
to a full stop: Yonkers Avenue--northwest quadrant

Palmer Avenue

Stratton Street

Nepperhan Avenue

Odell maintenance headquarters--Route 9A
Old Saw Mill River Road (Tarrytown Road)

Bedford Road near Manville Road

Manville Road--southwest quadrant

King Street

Parkview Terrace

Route 133 (West Main Street)

Croton Avenue

Kisco Avenue

Bedford Road--southeast quadrant

Old Cherry Street (Haines Road)

Harris Road
(e) Sprain Brook State Parkway. (1)

All vehicles approaching the Sprain Brook

State Parkway from the following shall, before entering the parkway, come to a
full stop: Grassy Sprain Reservoir

Hawthorne Barracks
(2)

All vehicles approaching the following
from the Sprain Brook State Parkway shall, before entering the same, come to a
full stop: Tuckahoe Road--southeast quadrant

Jackson Avenue--southbound only
(f) Taconic State Parkway. (1)

All vehicles approaching the Taconic

State Parkway from the following shall, before entering the parkway, come to a
full stop: Intersections at Kensico plaza

Broadway at Valhalla

Valhalla Place

Mount Pleasant Cemetery

Pleasantville Road

section)

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.36

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
